00053 struct client_record
00054 {
00055   time_t died_at; 
00056   uint32_t id; 
00057   struct sockaddr_in client_addr; 
00058   unsigned long long sleep_time; 
00059   unsigned amount; 
00060   int max_gap;

00066     bool is_set; 
00067     unsigned long long delta; 
00068   } min_latency;

00073   } max_latency; 
00074   unsigned long long total_latency;
